creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: woman with eyes closed and hands on her head
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Originally published as cover to Folk Songs by Nakayama Shinpei (Nakayama Shinpei min'yō kyoku 中山晋平民謡曲), vol. 17 in 1929. Reprinted in July 1930 in the series Complete Compositions by Nakayama Shinpei, Folk Songs (Nakayama Shinpei sakkyoku zenshū, Min'yō kyoku 中山晋平作曲全集　民謡曲).
title: Design for the songlet "Dragon Gorges"
